lines: Greetings, Tartarus. As the Three Fates will it, I am obliged to traverse your desecrated soils. Will you grant me passage.
Hadeeees, Son of Kronus. The gall you possess, to set foot in my dominion! Have you forgotten the ones responsible for pouring the filth in these desecrated soils you so brazenly speak of?
... You misunderstand, o' mighty Tartarus. I. DO. NOT. ASSOCIATE. WITH. THOSE. MONGRELS.
Silence! I shall not forgive your trangressions!
... It is time, to clean my basement.
